experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description: Contributing to the development of open-source tools and libraries for the Ultra blockchain ecosystem. Implementing features and improving SDKs, scripts, and automation tools for developers. Participating in technical workshops and developer meetups to support community growth. Collaborating with engineers and contributors to build resources and documentation for the Ultra developer community. Actively supporting the adoption of Ultra's technology through hands-on development and knowledge sharing.
achievements: Contributing to the development of open-source tools and libraries for the Ultra blockchain ecosystem
Implementing features and improving SDKs, scripts, and automation tools for developers
Participating in technical workshops and developer meetups to support community growth
Collaborating with engineers and contributors to build resources and documentation for the Ultra developer community
Actively supporting the adoption of Ultra's technology through hands-on development and knowledge sharing
Impact: Enhanced Ultra's developer ecosystem by delivering reliable, developer-focused tooling and improving onboarding resources, empowering builders and accelerating adoption across the platform

experiences.title: Junior Software Engineer
experiences.description: Development of the Web3 (blockchain) component of the game Ashes of Mankind (Empires). Implementation of the entire Web3 frontend and interaction with smart contracts. Participation in daily meetings and technical discussions in English.
achievements: Development of the Web3 integration layer of Ashes of Mankind (Empires) game
Complete implementation of Web3 frontend and smart contract interaction
Participation in daily meetings and technical discussions in English
Agile environment collaboration with international teams
Coordination with global teams for technical alignment

experiences.title: Moderator
experiences.description: Moderating international communities, organizing events and helping users. Participating in Black Ice Studios (Ashes of Mankind) game social networks moderation.
achievements: Moderating international communities
Event organization
User assistance
Participation in Black Ice Studios (Ashes of Mankind) game social networks moderation
Online community moderation

experiences.title: Lead Developer & MVP
experiences.description: Leading the technical design, development, and deployment of 7 decentralized applications on the Ultra blockchain, overseeing fullstack architecture and ensuring scalability and security. Participating in strategic decision-making as part of the management team, aligning technical initiatives with business goals and fundraising objectives. Authoring technical content and engaging with the community in English and French, including interviews with blockchain and game developers, enhancing the platform's visibility and thought leadership. Managing Agile sprints, coordinating development workflows, and ensuring timely delivery of MVPs on Ultra blockchain-based projects.
achievements: Led the technical design, development, and deployment of 7 decentralized applications on the Ultra blockchain, overseeing fullstack architecture and ensuring scalability and security
Participated in strategic decision-making as part of the management team, aligning technical initiatives with business goals and fundraising objectives
Authored technical content and engaged with the community in English and French, including interviews with blockchain and game developers, enhancing the platform's visibility and thought leadership
Managed Agile sprints, coordinated development workflows, and ensured timely delivery of MVPs on Ultra blockchain-based projects

experiences.title: Junior Software Engineer and Community Contributor
experiences.description: Development using the Ultra blockchain and its APIs, writing technical articles about it, and participating in community activities in both English and French (community engagement, interviews, etc...).
achievements: Development using the Ultra blockchain and its APIs
Writing technical articles about the Ultra blockchain
Participation in community activities in English and French
Community engagement and interviews

experiences.title: Junior Software Engineer

experiences.title: Founder and Director

experiences.title: Webmaster
experiences.description: I was in charge of the company's online communication by developing a complete set of websites to promote the products and services sold by the brand. I also managed the social networks and acquired many soft skills, especially in communication thanks to the customer relationship I was often confronted with. This experience allowed me to learn how to manage projects and made me gain confidence.
achievements: Development of a complete set of websites
Social media management
Acquisition of client communication skills
Project management and confidence building

experiences.title: Freelance in Digital Marketing
experiences.description: I started missions at the age of 17 at the same time as high school and stopped a little over three years later to devote myself fully to my studies. I learned project management, time and stress management and customer relations, while developing skills in several areas (video and image advertising, SEO writing, websites...). I accompanied more than 300 clients with 100% positive reviews and recommendations.
achievements: Accompanied more than 300 clients with 100% positive reviews and recommendations
Started missions at age 17 alongside high school
Learned project management
Time and stress management
Developed skills in video and image advertising
SEO writing and website development
Excellence in client relations and customer satisfaction
